channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scarlett Johansson says she's 'shocked, angered and in disbelief' over Sam Altman using a copycat voice for his new ChatGPT bot
item.description: OpenAI said it is “working to pause” Sky — the name of one of five voices that ChatGPT users can chose to speak with.

item.title: One dead as Singapore Airlines flight encounters 'severe turbulence'
item.description: One person has died aboard a Singapore Airlines flight which was diverted to Bangkok due to turbulence.

item.title: Earnings decline at Lowe's was smaller than analysts estimated
Biden and Trump united on heavy import tariffs as election approaches
item.description: Trump and Biden agree on essentially nothing else, from taxes and climate change to immigration and regulation.

item.title: Lowe's beats on earnings and revenue, even as consumers spend less on DIY projects
item.description: The home improvement retailer Lowe's said sales fell again year over year, and it reiterated its full-year earnings forecast.

item.title: Yellen says the U.S. is not trying to decouple from China
Gen Zers walk into the workplace with one foot out the door—slandering them won’t solve the future-of-work conundrum
item.description: In a society where possibilities are endless, it shouldn’t come as a shock that there is an appeal in betting on yourself if your values are being ignored.

item.title: Iran begins days of nationwide funeral rites for President Ebrahim Raisi after helicopter crash
item.description: Services for Raisi will be held between Tuesday and Thursday in Tabriz, Qom, Birjand and Iranian capital Tehran, before his burial in Mashhad.

item.title: Nasdaq-listed Advanced Energy says it is trying to buy XP Power at 68% premium
Trump’s Truth Social company lost more than $300 million in its first quarter as a public company
item.description: At this early stage in the Company’s development, TMTG remains focused on long-term product development, rather than quarterly revenue,” Trump Media said.

item.title: Britain's inflation rate could be about to drop below the Bank of England's 2% target
item.description: The headline inflation rate could be 'momentous,' but markets remain divided on the chance of a June cut and services will be the one to watch.

item.title: AstraZeneca's new $80 bln sales target for 2030 is higher than analyst forecasts
Drone pilots don't have First Amendment right to offer mapping services
item.description: The panel of the 4th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals, in upholding a trial court’s decision, found the free-speech protections of Michael Jones and his 360 Virtual Drone Services business weren't violated.

item.title: Trump allied Republicans are changing the GOP's approach to labor, free markets and regulation
item.description: To Trump-allied neopopulists corporate CEOs are not the GOP's allies in a war with big government. They are "woke" elitists, pushing liberal cultural values.

item.title: GSK late-stage trials of potential blockbuster asthma drug met goals
